title: Calories in a Cheese Stick
meta_description: Discover calories in cheese stick, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and simple tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 1 oz (28 g) mozzarella string cheese stick, pasteurized, no added flavors or coatings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (e.g., cheddar vs. mozzarella), size, and processing; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cheese stick provides ~80 kcal and ~7 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one cheese stick?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for a standard 1 oz mozzarella cheese stick.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a cheese stick?
Are cheese sticks high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 200 mg sodium per stick due to processing.
Very low, about 1 g carbs and 0 g fiber per stick.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in cheese stick?
faqs.a: Brands vary; some low-fat options are 50-60 kcal, full-fat up to 100 kcal.
